tasks.label: Compile translation .po -> .mo
args: for f in "languages"/*.po; do msgfmt -o "${f%.po}.mo" "$f" && echo "Compiled: ${f##*/}" || echo "Failed: ${f##*/}"; done

tasks.label: Generate pot file for translations (Developer)
tasks.command: wp i18n make-pot . languages/tumult-hype-animations.pot --domain=tumult-hype-animations && wp i18n update-po languages/tumult-hype-animations.pot languages/
